name: final-mockAPI
description: Mock/Test API for testing during the development of GraphQuill

scripts.resetPsql: node database/psql/resetPSQL.js && node database/psql/setupTablesPSQL.js && node database/psql/seedCustomers.js && node database/psql/seedProducts.js && node database/psql/seedCustomerOrders.js && node database/psql/seedOrderProducts.js && node database/psql/seedWarehouses.js && node database/psql/seedWarehouseInventory.js
scripts.resetDbs: npm run resetPsql && npm run resetMongo
